title: squadus2
author: squadus2
content: Hello everyone!I hope you're all having a great day. I'm thrilled to introduce you to my latest mobile app called Smart Bitcoin Investments. As the developer, I've poured my heart and soul into creating an app that I believe will greatly benefit the bitcointalk community. Now, I'm kindly requesting your support and feedback to make it even better!Smart Bitcoin Investments is designed to keep you informed and up to date on the subject of investing in bitcoin today. With its unique features and user-friendly interface, it aims to educate the public interest in bitcoin and alternative asset investments worldwide and help investors make smart, well-informed decisions.I would be incredibly grateful if you could take a few minutes to download and try out Smart Bitcoin Investments. Your honest reviews and feedback will play a vital role in improving the app and making it more useful for everyone in our community.To download Smart Bitcoin Investments, simply follow these steps:iOS Users: Visit the App Store and search for "Smart Bitcoin Investments" Click on the download button to install it on your device or follow this link: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1526857150Android Users: Go to the Google Play Store and search for "Smart Bitcoin Investments" Tap on the install button to get it on your device or follow this link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=app.smartbitcoininvestments.comOnce you've had a chance to explore the app, I kindly ask you to share your thoughts and experiences here in this thread. Your feedback will help me understand what's working well and identify areas that need improvement.Please feel free to ask any questions you may have, and I'll be more than happy to assist you. Your support means the world to me, and I genuinely appreciate your time and input.Thank you all for being such a wonderful community, and I'm excited to hear your thoughts on the app!

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: OP, I understand the excitement that comes with creating a new mobile app, especially in the crypto space. But let us not forget the importance of exercising caution when dealing with new and unverified apps, especially those related to cryptocurrencies.So, if you could kindly let us know whether your app is open source and provide a link to the source code, it would be greatly appreciated.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on May 17, 2023, 08:40:43 PMOP, I understand the excitement that comes with creating a new mobile app, especially in the crypto space. But let us not forget the importance of exercising caution when dealing with new and unverified apps, especially those related to cryptocurrencies.So, if you could kindly let us know whether your app is open source and provide a link to the source code, it would be greatly appreciated.Exactly  as a link to the source code will create more insight on the safety and security  of a user.I also want to ask why investment was included in your app name? Because I believe with that alone, you might not get more users as people would  think your app is an investment  site that uses bitcoin  and people wouldn't wan to dare to try that not from a user with just two post.Nevertheless,  I want to welcome you to forum and also encourage you not to get disappointed  by responses you might get but to be on the safer side and if you also want to gain more users or feedback to grow  your app, then you should possible consider running a review  campaign  and also run a signature campaign  for publicity  on how to get more users.There are several  reputable managers in the forum and if you need anyone you can as well contact @Royse777 as he is good at what he does.

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: That is great, I would love to check your app. But before promoting your application anywhere, be sure you fix all the bugs the app has otherwise your users will drop. Because it is an app related to cryptocurrency you have to make the app source public so that users can know it is safe to use.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: The reason why I avoid downloading unpopular apps is just because of the security, it's very vulnerable to us especially crypto users who have a hot wallet on our mobile gadgets.  In cases like this, I prefer to use a website to read information rather than downloading an unknown app.I tend to agree above, you need to prove to us here the legitimacy of your app.  I'm not accusing any fraudulent action but of course, doubt will always be on that side. By the way, that's a good initiative on spreading awareness, all you've to do now is to show the legitimacy of the app.

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: So the apps has been available since 2020 if I'm not mistaken? So technically it's not a new app.Why it took the OP so long to promote it in this community? Anyhow, as others have said, it this is closed source then it might sway investors to download it, just a precautionary measures.But in any case goodluck to the OP if you are the developer of the said apps, and I saw that it has been downloadedQuote1,000+ downloads

comments.author: arwin100
comments.body: Quote from: sheenshane on May 17, 2023, 11:42:04 PMThe reason why I avoid downloading unpopular apps is just because of the security, it's very vulnerable to us especially crypto users who have a hot wallet on our mobile gadgets.  In cases like this, I prefer to use a website to read information rather than downloading an unknown app.I tend to agree above, you need to prove to us here the legitimacy of your app.  I'm not accusing any fraudulent action but of course, doubt will always be on that side. By the way, that's a good initiative on spreading awareness, all you've to do now is to show the legitimacy of the app.Especially when they ask permission before we can use all the feature of the app this really bring huge risk for anyone tying to use that. Also we cannot assure if we can get accurate reviews since they don't have any reputation built yet. And for sure when starting up the owner will seek for more revenues then might grab the offers of scam to give them good reviews in exchange of payments. This is why its hood to have this forum since from here we can ask for real reviews and know the sentiments given by people about something we ask here.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.created_time: May 18, 2023, 11:54:40 AMLast edit: May 18, 2023, 01:13:58 PM by CryptSafe
comments.body: It is nice having more apps that would promote Crypto currency and bitcoin in general. As I see, your app seems to be incoperated into investment which is not a bad one but a welcomed development and hence would need your app to be more sophisticated security otherwise. Since it has to do with one investing his or her funds, it would be more convenient that one keeps track of their own investment on the app So as to keep abreast of activities and monitoring.I would like to ask you this question OP; what is the guarantee that this app is well secured to prevent hackers from accessing our details, funds and assets?

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: This can't be really called an app, it's just a bunch of info and links, and not-so-good info and not-so-good links either.I don't know where it pulls this info from or if OP is the author but there is a mess of everything there, for example, hey call Coinbase and Mycelium hot wallets, and when it goes into details it says stupid things like this:"Bitcoin addresses always begin with numbers 1 or 3". Common!or"A hardware wallet can be used for storing large amounts of bitcoin for the long term, while a mobile or desktop wallet is typically used for moving bitcoin between exchanges."Not to mention that LocalBitcoins is a recommended exchange, lol!In short, not so much of an "app" and you could probably have found all that info by just opening bitcoin.org in your browser.Quote from: squadus2 on May 17, 2023, 07:26:45 PMSmart Bitcoin Investments is designed to keep you informed and up to date on the subject of investing in bitcoin today. When your info is 1-3 years old seems like you need to be kept updated first.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: @squadus2Why not buy a Copper membership and then promote your app.Being a Copper Member the benefits are very simple. Like you would be able to post images and also gain trust. If you want to promote your product, do it the right way. Otherwise none of us will show any interest. Thanks.
